actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App.) to establish an Inspector General of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts, and for other purposes.
short_title: Inspector General of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts Act of 1995
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Inspector General of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts Act of 1995 - Amends the Inspector General Act of 1978 to direct the Judicial Conference of the United States to submit a list of individuals to the President for nomination, and the President to appoint an individual from such list to serve, as Inspector General of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts. Makes provisions of the Freedom of Information Act and the Privacy Act of 1974 applicable to such Office.

titles.title: Inspector General of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts Act of 1995
A bill to amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App.) to establish an Inspector General of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts, and for other purposes.
